web_snippets: Benjamin Bratton is the Director of the Antikythera program at Berggruen Institute. He is a Professor of Philosophy of Technology and Speculative Design.
Benjamin Bratton is a philosopher of technology. He is Professor of Philosophy of Technology and Speculative Design at the University of California, San Diego.
